== About ==
My name is Carlos Rabelo. I´m a Ubuntu fan since the 5.04 release. Currently I'm living in Brazil (City: Cuiabá, State: Mato Grosso). I first started Linux in 1999 with Conectiva (Brazilian distribution), moved to Redhat. In the last year know Ubuntu and I've been using it since.
